<a id="SliderJoint3D"></a>

# SliderJoint3D

**Inherits:** [Joint3D](Joint3D.md) **\<** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A physics joint that restricts the movement of a 3D physics body along an axis relative to another physics body.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A physics joint that restricts the movement of a 3D physics body along an axis relative to another physics body. For example, Body A could be a [StaticBody3D](StaticBody3D.md) representing a piston base, while Body B could be a [RigidBody3D](RigidBody3D.md) representing the piston head, moving up and down.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_SliderJoint3D_Param"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **Param**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param)

<a id="SliderJoint3D_constant_PARAM_LINEAR_LIMIT_UPPER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_LINEAR_LIMIT_UPPER** = `0`

Constant for accessing [linear_limit/upper_distance](SliderJoint3D.md#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/upper_distance). The maximum difference between the pivot points on their X axis before damping happens.<a id="SliderJoint3D_constant_PARAM_LINEAR_LIMIT_LOWER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_LINEAR_LIMIT_LOWER** = `1`

Constant for accessing [linear_limit/lower_distance](SliderJoint3D.md#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/lower_distance). The minimum difference between the pivot points on their X axis before damping happens.<a id="SliderJoint3D_constant_PARAM_LINEAR_LIMIT_SOFTNESS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_LINEAR_LIMIT_SOFTNESS** = `2`

Constant for accessing [linear_limit/softness](SliderJoint3D.md#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/softness). A factor applied to the movement across the slider axis once the limits get surpassed. The lower, the slower the movement.<a id="SliderJoint3D_constant_PARAM_LINEAR_LIMIT_RESTITUTION"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_LINEAR_LIMIT_RESTITUTION** = `3`

Constant for accessing [linear_limit/restitution](SliderJoint3D.md#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/restitution). The amount of restitution once the limits are surpassed. The lower, the more velocity-energy gets lost.<a id="SliderJoint3D_constant_PARAM_LINEAR_LIMIT_DAMPING"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_LINEAR_LIMIT_DAMPING** = `4`

Constant for accessing [linear_limit/damping](SliderJoint3D.md#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/damping). The amount of damping once the slider limits are surpassed.<a id="SliderJoint3D_constant_PARAM_LINEAR_MOTION_SOFTNESS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_LINEAR_MOTION_SOFTNESS** = `5`

Constant for accessing [linear_motion/softness](SliderJoint3D.md#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_motion/softness). A factor applied to the movement across the slider axis as long as the slider is in the limits. The lower, the slower the movement.<a id="SliderJoint3D_constant_PARAM_LINEAR_MOTION_RESTITUTION"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_LINEAR_MOTION_RESTITUTION** = `6`

Constant for accessing [linear_motion/restitution](SliderJoint3D.md#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_motion/restitution). The amount of restitution inside the slider limits.<a id="SliderJoint3D_constant_PARAM_LINEAR_MOTION_DAMPING"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_LINEAR_MOTION_DAMPING** = `7`

Constant for accessing [linear_motion/damping](SliderJoint3D.md#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_motion/damping). The amount of damping inside the slider limits.<a id="SliderJoint3D_constant_PARAM_LINEAR_ORTHOGONAL_SOFTNESS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param) **PARAM_LINEAR_ORTHOGONAL_SOFTNESS** = `8`

Constant for accessing [linear_ortho/softness](SliderJoint3D.md#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_ortho/softness). A factor applied to the movement across axes orthogonal to the slider.<a id="SliderJoint3D_constant_PARAM_LINEAR_ORTHOGONAL_RESTITUTION"></a>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="SliderJoint3D_property_angular_limit/damping"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **angular_limit/damping** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#SliderJoint3D_property_angular_limit/damping)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The amount of damping of the rotation when the limit is surpassed.

A lower damping value allows a rotation initiated by body A to travel to body B slower.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SliderJoint3D_property_angular_limit/lower_angle"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **angular_limit/lower_angle** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#SliderJoint3D_property_angular_limit/lower_angle)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The lower limit of rotation in the slider.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SliderJoint3D_property_angular_limit/restitution"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **angular_limit/restitution** = `0.7` [ðŸ”—](#SliderJoint3D_property_angular_limit/restitution)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The amount of restitution of the rotation when the limit is surpassed.

Does not affect damping.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SliderJoint3D_property_angular_limit/softness"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **angular_limit/softness** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#SliderJoint3D_property_angular_limit/softness)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

A factor applied to the all rotation once the limit is surpassed.

Makes all rotation slower when between 0 and 1.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/damping"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **linear_limit/damping** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/damping)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The amount of damping that happens once the limit defined by [linear_limit/lower_distance](SliderJoint3D.md#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/lower_distance) and [linear_limit/upper_distance](SliderJoint3D.md#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/upper_distance) is surpassed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/lower_distance"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **linear_limit/lower_distance** = `-1.0` [ðŸ”—](#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/lower_distance)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The minimum difference between the pivot points on their X axis before damping happens.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/restitution"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **linear_limit/restitution** = `0.7` [ðŸ”—](#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/restitution)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The amount of restitution once the limits are surpassed. The lower, the more velocity-energy gets lost.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/softness"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **linear_limit/softness** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/softness)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

A factor applied to the movement across the slider axis once the limits get surpassed. The lower, the slower the movement.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/upper_distance"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **linear_limit/upper_distance** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_limit/upper_distance)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The maximum difference between the pivot points on their X axis before damping happens.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SliderJoint3D_property_linear_motion/damping"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **linear_motion/damping** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_motion/damping)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The amount of damping inside the slider limits.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SliderJoint3D_property_linear_motion/restitution"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **linear_motion/restitution** = `0.7` [ðŸ”—](#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_motion/restitution)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The amount of restitution inside the slider limits.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SliderJoint3D_property_linear_motion/softness"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **linear_motion/softness** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_motion/softness)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

A factor applied to the movement across the slider axis as long as the slider is in the limits. The lower, the slower the movement.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SliderJoint3D_property_linear_ortho/damping"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **linear_ortho/damping** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#SliderJoint3D_property_linear_ortho/damping)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param), value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The amount of damping when movement is across axes orthogonal to the slider.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

- [float](float.md) **get_param**\ (\ param\: [Param](SliderJoint3D.md#enum_SliderJoint3D_Param)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The amount of restitution when movement is across axes orthogonal to the slider.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SliderJoint3D_property_linear_ortho/softness"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

<!-- classref-property-setget -->
